name: Guarantor App
description: Mobile-friendly offline-first guarantor report viewer with offline data sync for private use only. A comprehensive application for managing and searching guarantor records. Sync data from Google Sheets, access records offline, generate detailed reports, and manage information with advanced search capabilities. Features two-tier authentication (user and admin), real-time data synchronization with progress tracking, persistent local storage, WhatsApp/phone call integration, and Excel report generation.
